duck: Product data eXchange, an XML-based format used in manufacturing

wiki.text:
'PDX' may refer to:
* Portland International Airport's IATA code
* Union Station (Portland, Oregon)'s railway code
* Paradox (warez) or PDX, a warez group
* Performance Driving eXperience, a type of event sanctioned by the Sports Car
  Club of America
* PDX, a line of musical instruments and equipment by Vestax
* Product data eXchange, an XML-based format used in manufacturing
wiki.title: PDX
